body_html: Note that if you are building this for an app you'll probably want to wrap the cc_library in a cc_binary (see tensorflow/examples/android/BUILD for an example) so that unused code can be stripped out. Otherwise you'll end up with over 200mb of unnecessary size. Just make sure you export the symbols you want to reference so they don't get stripped as well.
body_text: Note that if you are building this for an app you'll probably want to wrap the cc_library in a cc_binary (see tensorflow/examples/android/BUILD for an example) so that unused code can be stripped out. body: Note that if you are building this for an app you'll probably want to wrap the cc_library in a cc_binary (see tensorflow/examples/android/BUILD for an example) so that unused code can be stripped out. Otherwise you'll end up with over 200mb of unnecessary size. Just make sure you export the symbols you want to reference so they don't get stripped as well.
